title: Bluegrass D3O Back Protection Vests go seamless for second-skin fit and comfort
content:
Bluegrass have left you with fewer excuses than ever to leave your back protector at home with their all-new seamless range of D3O back protection vests. While their predecessors used a jacket-like design with a full-length zipper up the front, the seamless range puts D3O impact protection into a light, breathable and so-called invisible pull-over […]

The post Bluegrass D3O Back Protection Vests go seamless for second-skin fit and comfort appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
